categories: Category:The Star Wars Sourcebook narrative fiction

nodes.text: SoroSuub Corporation Proclamation Number 137d is a short narrative story published in The Star Wars Sourcebook in 1987. It is the in-universe text of Siin Suub's Corporate Proclamation 137d regarding SoroSuub Corporation's takeover of Sullust. It was reprinted in the second edition of the book in 1994.
